strapiPost.title: Let Me Take A Selfie During The First Ever SNAPS NWA
strapiPost.content:
Immerse yourself in local art and capture a one-of-a-kind selfie during the first-ever SNAPS Selfie Pop-Up event hosted by Brick & Mortar and Arli Media in Downtown Rogers at 120 W Walnut St.

  • In focus: Interact with the creations of five regional artists, photographing yourself and your friends in each of the unique "snap spots" based on February's theme: All You Need Is Love.
  • Set a time: Join the VIP Night on Thursday, Feb 2, including a meet and greet with the artists, appetizers by The Sous Chef, drinks, and more. General admission will be available Friday, Feb 3, through Sunday, Feb 5.

Reserve a session for yourself or an entire group HERE.
